text.text: Kuyitana Africa Kubwerera ku Maziko a Utumwi

text.description1: Ndife Gulu la Matchalitchi (OSATI chipembedzo), tikugwira ntchito mu ubale (OSATI ndi dongosolo la bungwe). Okhazikika m'mitima mwathu (OSATI ndi malamulo), okhazikika pa kumanga Mpingo wa Yesu Khristu; kumanga PA maziko a Yesu Khristu NOKHA, kutsatira ziphunzitso za Atumwi.
text.description2: Ife monga gulu la Matchalitchi mu ubale wowona mtima wina ndi mnzake tikumanga Mpingo wa Yesu Khristu pa kontinenti ya Africa mogwirizana ndi maziko a Utumwi.
text.description3: Gwirizanani ndi Matchalitchi omwe ali ndi malingaliro ofanana. Pangani maubale omwe amachititsa mgwirizano mu Mzimu ndi Chikhulupiriro. Onetsetsani kuti Mpingo ukhalabe "maziko ndi mtengo" wa chowonadi. Fotokozani bwino masomphenya a Utumwi. Limbikitsani khalidwe laumulungu mwa mamembala a Mpingo. Phunzitsani, kulitsa, kukonzekeretsa ndi kutumiza amishonale achibale. Pangani magulu a Utumwi m'dziko lirilonse, dera ndi kontinenti.

text.heading: Maziko a chikhulupiriro chachikhristu ndi ofunika kwambiri pa moyo wokhala bwino pamaso pa Mulungu. Mu Ahebri 6, wolemba akufotokoza miyala ya maziko yomwe iyenera kukhazikitsidwa m'moyo wa okhulupirira. Mndandanda uwu wa m'Baibulo wa maziko umafufuza mwakuya mwala uliwonse wa maziko awa. Ichi ndi maziko 'Yesu Khristu'.
